title: Week 2 NFL Recap, Broncos Roll, Pats Respond (Football 9/18)
description:
Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco recap a wild Week 2 in the NFL, starting with the Broncos demolition effort against the Cowboys (:49), along with the Patriots bounce-back victory over the Saints (4:34). Next, the guys discuss an ugly Jaguars loss (8:21), if the Cardinals saved their season (10:51), and the Redskins winning in LA (13:07). Nick and Pete continue by praising Andy Reid and the Kansas City Chiefs (14:51), Jay Cutler's Miami debut (17:34), and the Raiders big win (22:23). More analysis follows on Steelers-Vikings (23:25), Seahawks-49ers (25:49), Bucs-Bears (28:20), Panthers-Bills (33:35), and Ravens-Browns (36:05). The Pick Six Week 2 recap concludes with a breakdown of the squad's Super Contest picks (38:51).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
